content:
/>
VIII.i.3.A.3.c
.
Chapter 18 Incompetent Beneficiaries
Beneficiaries over the age of 18 may be determined to be incompetent under the provisions of
38 CFR 3.353
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - General Chapter 18 Benefits Information
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A
